title: Readout of the Vice President's Call to Kurdistan Regional Government President Massoud Barzani | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
July 28, 2011

 



Readout of the Vice President's Call to Kurdistan Regional Government President Massoud Barzani





	The Vice President today called Kurdistan Regional Government President Massoud Barzani to offer condolences on the loss of President Barzaniâ€™s mother, Hamayil Khan, who passed away Wednesday. The Vice President told President Barzani that he wished he could have paid his respects in person and that his thoughts and prayers are with the Barzani family at this time.
